name: miscanthus rhizome production, for planting | miscanthus rhizome, for planting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8566/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 piece of miscanthus rhizome and 0.08 kg of chopped miscanthus as a by-product. Rhizomes are harvested 4 years after establishment of the plantation, miscanthus is harvested annually from second to fourth year. Moisture content of rhizomes at storage is 73.9%, number of harvested rhizomes is 500'000 (10'000 rhizomes planted; multiplication factor: 50), average weight of a rhizome is 70 g. Moisture content of chopped miscanthus at storage is 14% (= 15% water on a dry mass basis), dry matter yield at first harvest is 6'000 kg/ha, 17'000 kg/ha at second and third harvest.

This activity assumes miscanthus rhizome production for planting on a plantation with a lifetime of 4 years and represents the average expenditures of the production of 1 piece of miscanthus rhizome for planting (average weight 70 g). The inputs of mineral fertilisers, seed and pesticides are considered. It is assumed that no organic fertilisers are applied.


The dataset includes all machine operations and corresponding inputs of machine infrastructure and sheds. Machine operations are: soil cultivation, planting, fertilisation, weed control, pest and pathogen control, harvest and chopping of miscanthus as a by-product, breaking up of rhizomes into pieces by a rotary tiller and harvest of rhizome pieces by an adjusted potato harvester, transport of all harvested goods from field to farm (2 km), and storage of rhizomes in a cold storage house during 1 month. Further, direct field emissions are included. This activity ends after cold storage of rhizomes at the farm gate.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/013:Plant propagation/0130:Plant propagation

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The amounts of the flows are averages across all years of the plantation lifetime. Electricity consumption and infrastructure for cold storage house were extrapolated from the dataset 'potato seed production, Swiss integrated production, for setting".
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The inventories were generated on the basis of data from the 'GruBE' project (Hölscher et al. 2007) and complemented with information from expert estimates, extension service documents and literature. The sources used in the project were KTBL (2006) and personal communications from producers. --- Sources: Hölscher T., Deinmling S., Freiermuth Knuchel R., Gaillard G., Kägi T. & Müller-Sämann K. (2007) Energieoptionen aus landwirtschaftlicher Biomasse am Oberrhein - Auswirkungen für Landwirtschaft und Umwelt - Endbericht zum Projekt. Agentur für Nachhaltige Nutzung von Agrarlandschaften (ANNA). Müllheim, Germany. --- KTBL (2006) Energiepflanzen. Daten für die Planung des Energiepflanzenanbaus. Kuratorium für Technik und Bauwesen in der Landwirtschaft, Darmstadt, 372 p.

Total amount of active substance/s of pesticides needed for the production of miscanthus rhizome, for planting is calculated to be circa 3.60E-06 kg. Pesticide/s used in this dataset is/are: 'glyphosate'. The total amount of active substance/s is doubled in order to account for the packaging of the dilluted product of pesticide/s that is/are applied. Therefore, 7.20E-06 kg of packaging for pesticides is justified with this exchange.
